title: Back end infrastructure
custom_preconds: GIVEN back end project for WBCP has been setup in Kubernetes Cluster 3
custom_steps:
WHEN user logs in to AMT
OR attempts to do any action in the app
custom_expected:
THEN user should be able to login
AND navigate through the app with no issues

title: Set up Front End Infrastructure
custom_preconds: GIVEN Front End Infrastructure has been set up
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to https://wbcdev.mlb.com or https://wbcstg.mlb.com
custom_expected:
THEN login page should be displayed
(wireframe: https://app.zeplin.io/project/5cded8d49ee7bf1df97d20ff/screen/5cdeda5296f9892aa0db4178)
